lem in distributed systems theory. Basically you can use message-ids (equiv=

I think the patter=
n you described is slighty different: You POST your request to some factory=
 resource with a guid. It will return you the adress, where you can PUT the=
 person resource. If i remember correctly... :-)

Jakob
